summary:
Boost Your Teams Productivity With AI - AIGrain is an intelligent AI assistant that can be trained on business processes and knowledge base to support teams in various tasks.

 What can AIGrain do? - AIGrain can provide instant answers to business questions, upload data to build a knowledge base, provide sources for answers, boost employee efficiency, support troubleshooting, brainstorm ideas, and give suggestions.

 How It Works - Teach AIGrain what it needs to know, customize AIGrain for different uses, share AIGrain with teams or customers, and interact with AIGrain by asking questions.
